analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x37c50fd444edfaab330436d686d7c64618bf2f4d.sol:
	Contract ZiberToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x37c50fd444edfaab330436d686d7c64618bf2f4d.sol#157-158)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ZiberToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x37c50fd444edfaab330436d686d7c64618bf2f4d.sol#93)
ZiberToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x37c50fd444edfaab330436d686d7c64618bf2f4d.sol#91-92)
ZiberToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x37c50fd444edfaab330436d686d7c64618bf2f4d.sol#92-93)
